title: Carrand 93062 Deluxe Car Wash 10" Dip Brush with 65" Extension Pole, Blue and Black
description: For 30 years Carrand has pioneered automotive cleaning with innovation, quality, and value to help customers maintain their vehicles "showroom new" appearance inside and out. Carrand’s dip wash brush has a 10-inch super soft brush head with rubber bumper and 65-inch extension pole. Features foam grips for extra control.
